Package primitives

Class Ray

  • java.lang.Object
    • primitives.Ray
  • public class Ray
extends java.lang.Object
    Ray - a foundational object in geometry the group of points on a straight line that are on one relative side To a given point on the line called the beginning of the foundation. Defined by point and direction (unit vector) ...
